title: Delhi teens lead weekend cleanups on Yamuna ghat
dek: A student-led group removes 2 tons of waste in 3 weekends—now inviting schools to adopt a ghat.
what: Weekend cleanup drives on the ghat with waste sorting
how: Local students coordinate volunteers; MCD helps with pickup
why: To reduce river pollution and build civic pride
life_lesson: Small consistent actions beat occasional big gestures

title: Pune’s free bicycle library opens to school kids
dek: Community-run cycle bank lends refurbished bikes to students for the entire academic year.
what: Refurbish & lend cycles to school children
how: Volunteers repair donated bikes; sponsors cover parts
why: Enable healthier commutes and improve attendance
